nodes.bodyText: @maririos made this comment on my PR too, but it would be clearer if this was "Get the offset of the linked entity match text"
next time can you make these other test changes in another PR, it's a little hard to see what actual tests were added for offset and length
should we keep the offset and length after confidenceScore so that someone that depended on previous constructor would use this by just appending properties?
is this just cleanup? or what is the motivation for these changes
To add getDetectedLanguageEnglish(), getDetectedLanguageSpanish(), and getUnknownDetectedLanguage() helper methods. These result repeatedly used over many place, such as atomic operation.

my concern with having all this tests to look at specific values is that if the service changes something about their model, then our test will fail.
Make sure whenever u call this that the model-version is set to avoid it

Sounds good. Will take care of model-version in another PR. Since TA hasn't apply the model version in other APIs.
issue created: #13943
